MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the FK14 postcode area of Dollar is still ongoing. This is due to further repair work required onsite due to onsite difficulties and we now expect power to be back on by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:47pm on Tuesday, 02 March 2021
